Uses of Class
org.gsma.joyn.JoynServiceException

  • Packages that use JoynServiceException 
    Package Description
    org.gsma.joyn
    The RCS service is implemented into an Android background service which offers a high level API: the RCS Terminal API.
    org.gsma.joyn.capability
    This API permits to discover capabilities supported by remote contacts.
    org.gsma.joyn.chat
    This API exposes all functionality for single chat and group chat services.
    org.gsma.joyn.contacts
    This API exposes all infos related to joyn contacts.
    org.gsma.joyn.ft
    This API exposes all functionality to transfer files in real time.
    org.gsma.joyn.gsh
    This API exposes exposes all functionality related to sharing geolocations during a CS call via the Geoloc Sharing service.
    org.gsma.joyn.ipcall
    This API exposes all functionality related to IP voice call and IP video call services.
    org.gsma.joyn.ish
    This API exposes exposes all functionality related to transferring images during a CS call via the Image Sharing service.
    org.gsma.joyn.session
    This API exposes all functionality to initiate multimedia sessions between two end points based on a dedicated service ID (or feature tag).
    org.gsma.joyn.vsh
    This API exposes all functionality related to sharing live video stream during a CS call via the Video Sharing service.

      Joyn contact format exception.
